title: Octra to hold $20 million public token sale on Sonar at $200 million valuation
contentSnippet: Privacy-focused blockchain project Octra said the sale allocation could increase if demand is high. Any unsold tokens will be burned.

title: Bitcoin and ether surge on eve of FOMC decision fueling wave of liquidations
contentSnippet: Total levered short liquidations exceeded $260 million over the past four hours, according to CoinGlass data.

title: What a $440,000 Hack Shows About the Rising Threat of Ethereum 'Permit Scams'
contentSnippet: A single mistake cost one user nearly half a million dollars, highlighting how scammers are escalating phishing attacks.

title: ‘Nothing is holding up this bill,’ says Democratic Sen. Gillibrand as Senate barrels forward to advance major crypto bill
contentSnippet: Lawmakers are barrelling ahead to get a massive cryptocurrency bill advanced and moving forward to eventually land at President Trump's desk.

title: SEC Approves U.S.’ Second Crypto Index ETP with Bitwise’s BITW
contentSnippet: The Bitwise 10 Crypto Index Fund now trades on NYSE Arca, joining the ranks of gold and oil funds in regulated exchange products.

title: Crypto Shorts Get Rekt as Bitcoin, Ethereum and XRP Spike Ahead of Fed Decision
contentSnippet: Bitcoin is surging towards $95,000 on Tuesday ahead of the Fed's interest rate decision, hitting its highest price since mid-November.

title: Stripe and Paradigm’s payments-focused blockchain Tempo launches public testnet
contentSnippet: In October, the Ethereum-compatible Layer 1 said it raised $500 million in a Series A, valuing the company at $5 billion.

title: Michael Saylor Urges Middle East to Become the 'Switzerland of Bitcoin Banking'
contentSnippet: The executive chairman of Strategy pitched BTC-backed banking and yield products as a $200 trillion opportunity at the Bitcoin MENA conference.

title: Cascade Unveils 24/7 Neo-Brokerage Offering Perpetuals on Cryptos, U.S. Stocks
contentSnippet: The platform will let retail traders use one margin account to trade round-the-clock perpetual markets.

title: Circle tests privacy-preserving wrapped version of USDC on Aleo
contentSnippet: Circle is piloting a version of its flagship USDC asset featuring native privacy protections and “configurable compliance” features.

title: Bitcoin Surges to $94K One Day Ahead of Expected Fed Rate Cut
contentSnippet: The change from what's become typical bearish U.S. session action could signal seller exhaustion.

title: Marjorie Taylor Greene Claims 'CBDC Loophole Remains' in GENIUS Act
contentSnippet: A regulatory attorney told Decrypt that Greene’s claims about a CBDC loophole do not ‘have a real legal basis.’

title: PNC rolls out direct bitcoin trading for high-net-worth clients through Coinbase tie-up
contentSnippet: PNC says the move is driven less by near-term trading demand and more by keeping clients from shifting crypto activity to outside platforms.

title: Bitwise’s first-ever crypto investment product gets uplisted to the NYSE Arca
contentSnippet: "America’s first & largest crypto index fund — now in ETP format — is finally here," said Bitwise President Teddy Fusaro.

title: Securitize hires former PayPal executive as general counsel ahead of taking company public via SPAC
contentSnippet: In October, Securitize said it planned to public and list on the Nasdaq through a SPAC sponsored by an affiliate of Cantor Fitzgerald.

title: PNC Bank Enables Bitcoin Trading for Customers via Coinbase
contentSnippet: PNC Bank debuted a service allowing some customers to trade Bitcoin on its banking platform, broadening access through Coinbase.

title: Stripe-Backed Blockchain Tempo Starts Testnet; Kalshi, Mastercard, UBS Added as Partners
contentSnippet: Tempo, built by Stripe and Paradigm, has started testing payment-focused blockchain and has onboard a slew of institutional partners.

title: Do Kwon Judge Demands Answers Before Sentencing Over ‘Assurance’ He’ll Serve Time
contentSnippet: Judge asked whether Kwon might be freed abroad and asked for details on victims, time-served credit and unresolved charges ahead of sentencing.

title: UK Political Parties Call for Investigation into Reform UK Crypto Donations
contentSnippet: The Liberal Democrats have raised concerns over conflicts of interest, after Nigel Farage namechecked Tether in a September interview.

title: Bitcoin Treasury Company Twenty One Drops 25% in NYSE Debut, Trades Near PIPE Pricing of $10
contentSnippet: The company is led by Strike CEO Jack Mallers and began trading under the XXI ticker today following its SPAC merger with Cantor Equity Partners.

title: Will the ETF Era Usher in the End of Crypto Tribalism?
contentSnippet: There was once a time when you picked a side — the token you were excited about. But crypto has become one of the fastest-growing asset classes of the last decade. Soon, it seems, you’ll just pick an

title: Luxor expands hardware business into GPUs to support Bitcoin miners diversifying into AI
contentSnippet: The company is extending its procurement, logistics, and financing capabilities to help miners rapidly deploy accelerated compute capacity.

title: Most Influential: Don Jr., Eric and Barron Trump
contentSnippet: The sons of U.S. President Donald Trump have capitalized on their family name and crypto’s political momentum, carving out a profitable niche for themselves in the booming industry.

title: ‘Not a crypto winter, just a cold breeze’: Standard Chartered halves 2025 bitcoin target to $100K, but keeps long-term bull case
contentSnippet: Standard Chartered has halved its end-2025 bitcoin target to $100,000 but noted that the long-term bull case remains intact.

title: Morning Minute: Saylor and Tom Lee Buy Big
contentSnippet: Strategy and BitMine have calmed concerns that they may be tapped out with massive BTC and ETH purchases respectively. So what's the impact?

title: Ethereum’s P2P Layer Is Improving Just as Institutional ETH Buys Pick Up
contentSnippet: Early PeerDAS performance is proof that the Ethereum Foundation can now ship complex networking improvements at scale.

title: Standard Chartered Slashes 2025 Bitcoin Forecast to $100K
contentSnippet: The bank has cut its 2025 Bitcoin price target by half, citing the end of corporate buying and sharply slowing ETF inflows.

title: OCC Chief: Banks Blocking Crypto Custody Is 'Recipe for Irrelevance'
contentSnippet: Comptroller of the Currency Jonathan Gould warned that restricting national trust banks from digital assets would stifle innovation.

title: VeChain Unveils New 'Hayabusa' Consensus and Tokenomics Upgrade
contentSnippet: With more than 5.5 million app users in the last year, VeChain is focusing on tangible use cases for crypto that “you can hold in your hands.”

title: ASIC Expands Digital Asset Relief For Stablecoin Intermediaries
contentSnippet: The Australian regulator indicated the framework could expand as additional stablecoin and wrapped token issuers secure AFS licences.

title: NFT winter deepens: Monthly sales hit lowest point of the year
contentSnippet: NFT sales fell to $320 million in November — their lowest this year — with early December off to a weak start as top collections slide across the board.

title: Animoca eyes stablecoins, AI, DePIN as it expands focus in 2026: Exec
contentSnippet: Animoca Brands’ Keyvan Peymani says the Web3 gaming company is exploring all segments of the crypto industry, including DePIN, DeFi and AI.

title: Conor McGregor calls out Khabib over NFTs, gets shut down by ZachXBT
contentSnippet: The former UFC champion tried to launch his own celebrity memecoin, REAL, in April, but the project failed to gain traction.

title: Memecoin market sinks to 2025 low as $5B wiped out in a day
contentSnippet: Both memecoins and NFTs have plunged to their weakest levels since early 2025, with traders pulling back from speculative assets across the board.

title: NFT and memecoin markets recover after month-long crypto slump
contentSnippet: NFTs posted selective gains led by blue chips, while memecoins rallied broadly across major names in a sentiment-driven rebound.

title: NFTs hit the brakes: Market cap tanks 46% in just 30 days
contentSnippet: CoinGecko data shows the NFT market value has nearly halved in a month, with even top collections like BAYC and CryptoPunks losing ground.

title: Valve’s Counter-Strike 2 update crashes $5.8B economy, revives NFT debate
contentSnippet: A major update to Counter-Strike 2’s item mechanics wiped nearly $2 billion from its $5.8 billion skin market, igniting debate over central control in gaming.

title: Coinbase splashes $25M to revive a podcast from the last bull run
contentSnippet: Coinbase has paid $25 million for an NFT that compels the once popular crypto podcast UpOnly to restart. Bull market vibes anyone?

title: OpenSea rejects pivot from NFTs, says it’s evolving to ‘trade everything’
contentSnippet: OpenSea CEO Devin Finzer says the platform isn’t abandoning NFTs but expanding into a universal onchain trading hub.

title: Swiss regulator GESPA takes aim at FIFA’s NFT platform in formal complaint
contentSnippet: Switzerland’s nationwide gambling authority said user rewards on the platform feature the element of chance, categorizing them as gambling.
